data.name: RIFT Intermediate Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take the next step in your adventures! This pack is perfect for players looking to dive deep into RIFT, offering awesome bonuses to help you on your way, including a rad new mount, Ascended weapons, a gargantuan 40-slot bag, 30 days of Patron, and more.

INCLUDES:

30 Days of Patron Time

Get currency bonuses, extra loot, boosts, power-ups, convenience perks, and more.

Drakcoon's Rad Rider

Speed around the planes with this rad new Arclight Rider mount.

Ascended Weapons

Never stop fighting! These unique, self-healing weapons also increase the amount of tokens you gain.

Packmaster's Perfect Planar Pouch of Plentiful Pockets

Store absolutely everything you could ever need with this gargantuan 40-slot bag.

Packmaster's Reward Cache

Open this cache and snag a pile of Individual Reward Charges and Challenger's Marks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
